name: 10 Seconds Til Spawn
description:
10 Seconds Til Spawn

A sentient AI crashes onto an alien planet, corrupting its memory and damaging its ship in the process. The AI only needs 5 minutes to repair itself, but its only means of defense against hostile wildlife in the meantime is to produce Defense Droids. Unfortunately, the AI's blueprints for Defense Droids is also corrupted so it can only produce Defense Droids with a battery life of 10 seconds. Defend the AI's ship for 5 minutes while controlling a series of Defense Droids with a battery life of only 10 seconds.

Game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51. The theme was "Every 10 Seconds."

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left click (hold or click) - Shoot

R - Reload
